EmailTemplate.name: DueDateRejection_capa
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Request for Due Date change of {!01I61000000v12Z.Name} has been Rejected.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The request to change the Due date of the {!01I61000000v12Z.RecordType} of CAPA record {!01I61000000udkO.Name} is Rejected.
Rejection comment:
{!ApprovalRequest.Comments} .
Please log in to the Qualityze application and restart the process as necessary.
Thank you.
Click here for details{!01I61000000udkO.RecordType}
